name: Project Nekton
description:
Project Nekton was the codename for a series of  operations that ended with the United States Navy entering the Challenger Deep, the deepest surveyed point in the world's oceans.

This game was made in one week as a self challenge. It's a vertical scrolling mobile game where you're a submarine trying to get to the bottom of the ocean while getting oxygen supplies and avoiding bumping into fish.

Have fun and leave a comment!

  • Some assets were based on Rapidpunches' Mega Marine Pack
  • Soundtrack by: Tad On
Install instructions: - Download the .apk file in your mobile device - Run the file to install it - Enjoy!
